price: Bunu (nesilden nesile) birbirlerine vasiyet mi ettiler? Doğrusu onlar azgın bir topluluktur.
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
